attributes.action: Stop lufthansa just selling bmi's slots!
attributes.additional_details: Lufthansa group are going to sell bmi's slots to IAG and put thousands of people out of work.IAG will not take on staff and the government will pay the price for this!

rejection.details: It is not clear what action the petition is calling on the Government to take: any sale is a commercial decision for Lufthansa - is the petition saying that the Government should simply prevent the company taking such decisions?
